author: Danielle Wallace
title: China promoting US lockdown protests, spreading coronavirus misinformation online: report
description: China, taking notes from Russia’s playbook, is spreading misinformation about the coronavirus in the United States by sending text messages, as well as boosting social media posts, aimed at sowing public fear and promoting lockdown protests amid the pandemic,…
content:
